component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
value false java.lang.Object TreeNode instance to model the tree
var false java.lang.String Name of the request-scoped variable that'll be used as the holder of each treenode data
dynamic false java.lang.Boolean false Dynamic trees use ajax to load nodes and non-dynamic setting creates a pure client side tree.
cache false java.lang.Boolean true Specifies node caching for nodes loaded with ajax. When set to true(default), re-expanding a collapsed node will not do an ajax request.
expandAnim false java.lang.String Animation to be displayed on node expand, valid values are "FADE_IN" or "FADE_OUT"
collapseAnim false java.lang.String Animation to be displayed on node collapse, valid values are "FADE_IN" or "FADE_OUT"
nodeSelectListener false javax.el.MethodExpression void nodeSelectListener(org.primefaces.event.NodeSelectEvent) Method expression to listen node select events
nodeExpandListener false javax.el.MethodExpression void nodeExpandListener(org.primefaces.event.NodeExpandEvent) Method expression to listen node expand events
nodeCollapseListener false javax.el.MethodExpression void nodeCollapseListener(org.primefaces.event.NodeCollapseEvent) Method expression to listen node collapse events
onNodeClick false java.lang.String Event handler to execute when a tree node is clicked
expanded false java.lang.Boolean false Determines if all nodes of the tree should be expanded initially.
update false java.lang.String
Client side id of the component(s) to be updated after async partial submit request triggered by a node click.
onselectStart false java.lang.String
Javascript event handler to be called before ajax request for ajax node selection request begins.
onselectComplete false java.lang.String
Javascript event handler to be called after ajax request for node selection request is completed.
selection false org.primefaces.model.TreeNode[]
A TreeNode array that would be populated with the selected nodes.
style false java.lang.String Style of the main container of panel.
styleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the main container of panel.
propagateSelectionUp false java.lang.Boolean false Specifies if selection will be propagated up to the parents of clicked node.
propagateSelectionDown false java.lang.Boolean false Specifies if selection will be propagated down to the children of clicked node.
